required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Screening of Specific Genes for Pigmented Villous Nodular Synovitis
clinical_study.official_title: Screening of Specific Genes for Pigmented Villous Nodular Synovitis

brief_summary.textblock: This study retrospectively analyzed the history of present illness of PVNS patients in our hospital. The enrolled patients were followed up by telephone to follow up their postoperative recovery and living conditions. Take the patient's pathological specimens for immunohistochemical testing, evaluate the relationship between the expression of different molecular targets, clinical manifestations and patient prognosis, and explore new molecular targets related to disease diagnosis and treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: This study retrospectively analyzed the symptoms, time of onset, injury history, laboratory examinations, imaging examinations, and intraoperative conditions of PVNS patients in our hospital. The enrolled patients were followed up by telephone to follow up their postoperative recovery and living conditions (VAS score, SF-36 score). Take the patient's pathological specimens for immunohistochemical testing, evaluate the relationship between the expression of different molecular targets, clinical manifestations and patient prognosis, and explore new molecular targets related to disease diagnosis and treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of scale score between immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group
primary_outcome.description: Difference of Visual Analog Score for pain between CSF-1 immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of Visual Analog Score for pain between TNF-α immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group
primary_outcome.description: Difference of Visual Analog Score for pain between TNF-α immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of Visual Analog Score for pain between IL-1B immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group
primary_outcome.description: Difference of Visual Analog Score for pain between IL-1B immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of SF-36 score between CSF-1 immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group
primary_outcome.description: Difference of SF-36 score between CSF-1 immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of SF-36 score between TNF-α immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group
primary_outcome.description: Difference of SF-36 score between TNF-α immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of SF-36 score between IL-1B immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group
primary_outcome.description: Difference of SF-36 score between IL-1B immunohistochemistry positive group and negative group

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation between basic demographic characteristics and scale scores
secondary_outcome.description: Correlation between age, gender and scale score

study_pop.textblock: Patients with "pigmented villonodular synovitis" and "giant cell tumor of tendon sheath"

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Clinical diagnosis of pigmented villonodular synovitis.
2. Clinical diagnosis of giant cell tumor of tendon sheath
Exclusion Criteria:
1. No surgical treatment.
2. There were no pathological specimens during the operation.
3. The age of the patient is less than 18 years old or more than 60 years old.
4. The operation record shows nodular type.

facility.name: Institute of Sports Medicine, Peking University Third Hospital, Beijing Key Laboratory of Sports Injuries， Beijing, China
